nodes.text: Jarmat Dav're was a starship designer for Kuat Drive Yards. He was a mid-level project manager on many secret projects and rarely concerned himself with galactic politics. However, he started to pay attention to rumors and reached out quietly to colleagues at other companies. He managed to piece together information on Imperial weapons development and atrocities. Disturbed at what he found but unsure of what to do, he also discovered that the ISB had noticed his queries. He quickly fled under an assumed name and hid on an isolated tropical island located in the Outer Rim territories.
